data.title: Bitcoin meltdown: Strategy stock tanks over 60%; retail ETF wipe-outs spark fresh fears for major benchmarks - The Times of India
data.description: International Business News: Investors who followed Michael Saylor's Bitcoin strategy are now facing heavy losses. Strategy Inc.'s stock has seen a sharp decline, causing leverage
data.keywords: Bitcoin meltdown,Strategy Inc. stock,Bitcoin investments,leveraged ETFs,retail investors losses,bitcoin
